message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR 

The paper deals with the development of an automated system for detecting red light violations using video snapshots from roadside surveillance cameras. This involves computer vision techniques such as background subtraction and object tracking, which are commonly used in the computer vision (cs.CV) and machine learning (cs.LG) fields. The system also involves analyzing potential occlusions, which is a concern in the computer security (cs.CR) field. The use of adaptive background images and image analysis techniques also suggests the involvement of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and information retrieval (cs.IR) sub-categories.
